about_the_game:
Vampire arives searching for her sister. Her searches bring her to town of Serina, where she becomes involved in the dilemma of Witch Sisters. The only person who's with her is her loyal maid.



Chandra is a vampire. She has no interest in saving the town of Serina and has simply come for personal reasons that are to find her missing sister, after hearing a rumor that she was in the castle. She has unique blood magic and fights using dual wielded weapons such as swords or axes. If she gets hurt, she can use a powerful blood frenzy attacks.
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Fully voice acted playable character and a fully voice acted follower
  • New gameplay features of blood magic and dual wielding
  • New bonus dungeon, accessible by everyone
  • New difficult boss with special, unique loot
  • Four new weapons
  • One new magic spell
  • Two new music tracks
  • Two new achievements
